## Foo

Demo:

```tsx
import React from 'react';
import { Foo } from 'backgron-utils';
import {Foo as UI} from 'backgron-ui';

export default () => {
  Foo('utils')
  return (
    <>
        <h1>backgron-utils</h1>
        <UI/>
    </>

  )
};
```

More skills for writing demo: https://d.umijs.org/guide/basic#write-component-demo
